item.title: The Mojave Experiment Hosted on Linux & Apache
item.description:
The Mojave Experiment is a silly Microsoft marketing ploy designed to convince people they really do like Windows Vista.

Regardless, [I find it hilarious that they don’t use IIS to host their web site.][1]

According to the Server field of the response headers they’re using Apache/2.2.3 on CentOS!

[1]: http://www.mojaveexperiment.com/oh-noes-this-doesnt-exist-404
